name: COLUR
description:
Since birth I have not been able to see colors as many people around me are able too, therefore I have had to adapt various aspects of my life to fit my unique situation.  I have been a software developer for many years and have recently grown quite fond of the ideal of shifting my attention towards completing a game that speaks to peoples creativity.

COLUR was initially designed to be a game I could just start up and look at and enjoy the various colors of nature & earth.  However, as with most games my ideal has evolved into something that I feel can be a thing of true beauty.  Now, I am ready to share my creation to the world to see if there is a want for such a game.

Please keep in mind this is a VERY EARLY PROTOTYPE and I am posting here to mainly gain a foothold on the game as well as to see what the community might want from the game.  I am VERY OPEN to suggestions such as gameplay techniques, mechanics, artwork, etc.  I really want the communities help to polish my game and get a release out to the world.

Thank you all for your consideration and your time, I truly cherish every moment that I have been able to work on this game and pour so much of my soul into it.

CONTROLS

Move the RGB values up by left-clicking (holding) on the palette of the selected node.  Move the RGB values down by right-clicking (holding) on the palette of the selected node.  Once you have cleared a board you will have to ALT+F4 the game as I have yet to implement a system that loads an incremental map.
